author: Ubisoft
description:
To sum up your weekend:
🎮 Tight & Challenging Platforming & Parkour – yep, you’ll die a lot.
🤸‍♂️ Acrobatic, Fluid Combat – look cool… or die. Again.
🛠️ Craft Your Playstyle – every run’s unique, a good excuse to… yep, die.
🎵 Epic Soundtrack – cool enough to keep you alive!
title: Deep Dive Trailer The Rogue Prince of Persia

author: Ubisoft
title: ℹ️ Denari's T.R.I.P. Connectors will be no match for a well placed EMP from Thatcher.

author: Ubisoft
description:
Heroes of Might and Magic Turns 30! Join us on October 9th to celebrate three epic decades of adventure, strategy, and unforgettable memories. Many surprises await including special guests, giveaways and more!

And that's not all. We want you to help us shape the event:
- Submit your creation to mightandmagic_event@ubisoft.com
- Vote for your favorite tracks on our official Social Media Channels.
- Follow the 30th Anniversary Tournament at H3.gg and cheer our heroes!
Stay tuned for more info on https://mightandmagic.com

About Heroes of Might and Magic:
Step into the world of Heroes of Might and Magic, the turn-based strategy series where you lead powerful heroes, build kingdoms, and command armies of mythical creatures in epic, tactical battles. Discover new factions, creatures, and challenges in a universe that evolves with every installment

#Ubisoft #HoMM

About Ubisoft:
Ubisoft is a creator of worlds, committed to enriching players’ lives with original and memorable entertainment
title: Heroes of Might and Magic: 30th Anniversary Teaser
